channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Tug of War Over SpaceX Launching the Biggest Rocket Ever
item.description: SpaceX is squaring off against government regulators as it seeks to test launch its Starship rocket more frequently. Company executives and members of...

item.title: The Dark Side of Meta's Algorithms
item.description: Key articles from The Wall Street Journal’s 2023 investigation into how Instagram and Facebook connected networks of pedophiles.

item.title: Harris’s doctor says she’s in ‘excellent health’ as she seeks contrast with Trump
item.description: Harris’s physician concludes that she ‘possesses the physical and mental resiliency required to successfully execute the duties of the presidency.’

item.title: Harris dismisses Trump as ‘not serious’ on the economy in MSNBC interview
item.description: It was her first solo interview with a national network as the Democratic presidential nominee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Infineon Technologies, STMicroelectronics and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: The Harmful Impact of Mass Illegal Migration on Native Tribes from Panama to the U.S.

item.title: Trump amplifies falsehoods about immigrants in closing appeal
Janet Yellen Defends Her Record – and Delivers a Warning
item.description: The Treasury secretary is defending her legacy — and warning that the stability of the U.S. economy is at stake.

item.title: Election 2024 latest news: Harris releases letter from doctor; Trump continues campaign swing in western U.S.
item.description: Get the latest news from the 2024 campaign trail in the contest between Vice President Harris and former president Donald Trump.

item.title: TikTok Makes Layoffs as It Rejigs Content Moderation Operations
item.description: The China-owned social-media platform is laying off employees as part of a revamp of its content-moderation operations.

item.title: Harris’s doctor says she’s in ‘excellent health’ as she seeks contrast with Trump

item.title: Seniors Worried About Rising Costs of Illegal Immigration Told to Suck It Up by Their Mayor
item.description: In what has to be one of this year’s most outrageous examples of disregard for American citizens in favor of illegal aliens, one callous Maine politic...

item.title: There’s a Reason Harris’ Campaign Is Locked in on Quick Fixes
item.description: The Democratic nominee isn’t campaigning much on the Biden administration’s bigger, slower-moving policies.

item.title: No Matter Who Writes the Check, U.S. Taxpayers Bear the Burden of Illegal Immigration
item.description: Mass immigration advocates have what they think is a nifty new idea to deal with the soaring state and local cost of illegal immigration, now estimate...

item.title: Fed moves to protect weakening job market with bold rate cut
item.description: The move signals that the central bank is growing nervous about the declining labor market.

item.title: Biden touts economic gains, acknowledges a long way to go
item.description: Interest rate cut "is not a declaration of victory, it’s a declaration of progress."

item.title: This AI Pioneer Thinks AI Is Dumber Than a Cat
item.description: Yann LeCun, an NYU professor and senior researcher at Meta Platforms, says warnings about the technology’s existential peril are ‘complete B.S.’

item.title: JD Vance’s mom got health coverage under Trump — by using Obamacare
